component.name: ESO AddOn Manager
component.summary: Manage addons for The Elder Scrolls Online

description.p: Update and install addons for ESO. Primarily built on Linux for Linux.

ul.li: Install, remove, and search addons from esoui.com
Cross-platform support for Linux, macOS, and Windows
Specific support for ESO on the Steam Deck through Flathub
Options to auto update Tamriel Trade Centre prices and HarvestMap data
Light and dark UI themes
Import managed addons from Minion
Identify and install missing dependencies

description.p: Version 0.4.14 brings a slinky-dinky fix for Steam Deck desktop mode.

ul.li: Change: Update dependencies
Fix: App starting in fullscreen on Steam Deck desktop mode
Fix: Crash with empty addon file hash

description.p: Version 0.4.13 includes a new addon list view and settings options:

ul.li: New: Add option to check for addon updates on app launch
New: Add TamrielTradeCentre region selection (instead of always downloading NA and EU)
New: Add individual indicators for long-running tasks
New: URLs are now visible on hyperlink hover
New: Add application icon to native window titlebar (macOS, Wayland not supported yet)
Change: Addon list view is now more compact
Fix: Addon action buttons won't float away on resize

description.p: Version 0.4.12 includes minor security and bug fixes:

ul.li: Change: Update dependencies
Change: Update flatpak runtime to 24.08
Fix: Compile-time warnings about deprecated functionality

description.p: Version 0.4.11 includes minor changes for Steam Deck and addon details:

ul.li: Change: Remove bbcode parsing from UI. It will remain disabled until there is a proper solution for rendering bbcode formatted text
Change: Update dependencies
Change: Reduce app size
Fix: Pixels-per-point too large on Steam Deck

description.p: Version 0.4.10 includes backup/restore feature, minor fixes:

ul.li: New: Add backup/restore functionality, making addon lists more portable
New: Add indicator for main process tasks
New: Add EU support for TTC downloads (thanks Wedmer!)
Change: Update dependencies
Change: Set minimum window size
Change: Fullscreen mode on steamdeck to attempt resolution fix
Remove: No longer used dependencies

description.p: Version 0.4.9 brings images, bug fixes, and responsive layout improvements:

ul.li: New: Add screenshots view to details page.
New: Add category icons to addon lists.
New: Add file details view to details page.
New: Add light and dark mode toggles.
Change: Replace egui_file with rfd for native file dialogs.
Fix: Issue with minion import button not reporting progress correctly.
Fix: Addons lists not resizing.

description.p: Version 0.4.8 is here with a major UI update and the following changes:

ul.li: New: Major internal changes to view handling and layout.
New: Game version support in addon detail view.
New: Author view. From any addon detail page, select the author name to see all other addons by them.
Change: AddOn lists now display all addons without truncating.
Change: Consolidated category and search pages for installing new addons.
Change: Missing dependencies are now reported on any missing addons.
Change: Missing dependencies view does not hog main window or prevent addon install.
Fix: Import from minion no longer results in endless spinner.
Fix: All relevant views now update on addon install status changes.
Fix: Onboarding now diplays on new installs.
Fix: Changing addon directory in settings should default to a valid directory in file dialog.

description.p: This release brings the following changes and updates:

ul.li: Update layout so tab bar is always visible.
Add raw text view option for addon descriptions and changelogs.
Change auto-update functionality to update all button.
Add install and update addon funcitonality to addon detail view.
